any`any`any`any`any`any`any`Sat`The fresh mountain air is nice on a day like this.$h#$e#I wonder if the frogs will make an appearance soon.

any`any`any`any`any`any`any`Fri6`The birds were happily chirping today. They're too simple to understand the future.#$e#It's better to be like them, isn't it?
any`any`any`any`any`any`any`summer`The air is so thick with honey and nectar all summer. I almost feel dizzy.$u

any`any`any`any`any`any`any`Tue`I've seen wild horesradish in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.

any`any`any`any`any`any`any`Wed6`Stardew Valley is nice, but I wish I knew more people.#$e#I'm glad that we've become friends.
any`any`any`any`any`any`any`summer`I've been seeing wild fruits in the forest lately.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
any`any`any`any`any`any`any`summer6`Time seems to go by faster and faster the older you get...$s
any`any`any`any`any`any`any`fall`I've seen edible mushrooms in the forest.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.
any`any`any`any`any`any`any`fall6`You know, I used to want to be a farmer myself. Well, more like a rancher.#$e#I always loved movies about the wild west when I was a girl.
any`any`any`any`any`any`any`winter`Winter is harsh, but you can dig up some roots if you're lucky.#$e#Foraging can be a fun way to earn some cash. Or you can use what you find as gifts or food.

any`any`any`any`any`any`any`Thu`How's the farming business going? It's parsnip season, isn't it?#$e#I can imagine it being pretty peaceful, working outdoors with plants all day.

any`any`any`any`any`any`any`Sun`It's good to take a break from work every now and then.#$e#I guess that's kind of difficult when you live on a farm, though.#$e#Hey, at least in the winter you don't have to worry about crops.

any`any`any`any`any`any`any`summer`Make sure to water your plants every day.#$e#Although, if you're using water retaining soil you don't need to worry about watering as often.#$e#It's pretty convenient.
